Package koopa.core.sources

package koopa.core.sources
  • Class
    Description
    AsReplacing
    Marks all Tokens as replacing something Replaced.
    BashStyleComments
    This looks for bash-style comments (starting with a hash '#' mark, up to the end of the line) in the source and marks them as comment.
    BasicSource
    Base for implementing a Source.
    BasicTokens
     
    ChainingSource
    Base for implementing a Source which builds on the output of another.
    LineSplitter
    This class takes a Reader and spits out tokens.
    ListSource
    This is a Source which is backed by a List.
    NullSource
     
    Printing<T extends Data>
     
    Source
    This is the counterpart to Targets.
    Sources
     
    StackOfSources
    This can handle a stack of Sources to act as one.
    TagAll
    Tags all tokens coming from the source with the given tags.
    TokenSeparationLogic
    This class knows how to split up a Token into its basic elements, as defined in SyntacticTag.
    TokenSeparator
    This Source splits up incoming Tokens using the TokenSeparationLogic.
